body:
### ![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/39-1.png)

__New released brands__

*Enfa, Charles & Keith, Printcious, Love, Bonito, Aneka Home & Aldo*

We have good news to share with you! 6 more brand partners have been onboarded with Raiz Rewards. Ranging from clothing lines, home essentials, to printing services, we‚Äôve got it all.

Shop online and you will be rewarded! That means when you shop with our brand partners through Raiz Rewards, you will receive a cash reward which will be invested back into your Raiz Investment Account.

So, as you shop, you invest! Be on your way to receive a cash reward just by clicking the ‚Äú__Shop Online Here__‚Äù button through Raiz Rewards\*.

*\*__Terms & Conditions apply.__*

Check out our new brand partners below!

A world leader in infant nutrition for over a century, providing the very best nutritional supplements to help children grow stronger and healthier at every stage of their development.

Shop online now with __Enfa__ through Raiz Rewards and you‚Äôll get¬†__2.45%¬†__of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.
